Background:

New to the startup scene, I caught the bug while working for Jeff Peden at Cravelabs. I created and wrote the Cravelabs' Bostinno Channel blog to spread awareness about the need for our product by writing in a way to connect with the customers instead of selling to them. I also collected and analyzed data about our customers' social media habits and usage to develop a marketing funnel. Excited to stay in Boston and continue the journey with Boston Startup School!
